people.name: Leopold Infeld
people.description: Leopold Infeld  was a Polish physicist who worked mainly in Poland and Canada .

people.name: Carl Laemmle
people.description: Carl Laemmle  was a pioneer in American film making and a founder of one of the original major Hollywood movie studios – Universal.

people.name: Upton Sinclair
people.description: Upton Beall Sinclair, Jr.   was an American writer of nearly 100 books and other works across a number of genres.

people.name: Wolfgang Pauli
people.description: Pauli was born in Vienna to a chemist Wolfgang Joseph Pauli  and his wife Bertha Camilla Schütz; his sister was Hertha Pauli, the writer and actress.

people.name: Arthur Compton
people.description: Arthur Holly Compton  was an American physicist who won the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1927 for his discovery of the Compton effect, which demonstrated the particle nature of electromagnetic radiation.

people.name: Leo Szilard
people.description: Leo Szilard  was a Jewish Hungarian-born physicist and inventor.

people.name: Enrico Fermi
people.description: Enrico Fermi  was an Italian physicist, who created the world's first nuclear reactor, the Chicago Pile-1.

people.name: Léon Brillouin
people.description: Léon Nicolas Brillouin  was a French physicist.  He made contributions to quantum mechanics, radio wave propagation in the atmosphere, solid state physics, and information theory.

items.name: The Evolution of Physics: The Growth of Ideas From Early Concepts to Relativity and Quanta
items.description: It is a book about The Evolution of Physics: The Growth of Ideas From Early Concepts to Relativity and Quanta. It says: The Evolution of Physics: The Growth of Ideas From Early Concepts to Relativity and Quanta is a science book for the lay reader, by Albert Einstein and Leopold Infeld, tracing the development of ideas in physics.   The following people are mentioned:  Physics Michael Faraday Leopold Infeld Books about the history of science  And the following place: Austria-Hungary

items.name: Physics
items.description: It is a book about Physics. It says: Physics  is the natural science that involves the study of matter and its motion and behavior through space and time, along with related concepts such as energy and force.   The following people are mentioned:  Niels Bohr Albert Einstein Wolfgang Pauli   And the following place: Austria-Hungary

cities.name: Austria-Hungary
cities.description: Austria-Hungary , also known by  and often referred to as the Austro-Hungarian Empire in English-language sources, was a constitutional union of the Austrian Empire  and the Kingdom of Hungary  that existed from 1867 to 1918, when it collapsed as a result of defeat in World War I.

cities.name: Wooster, Ohio
cities.description: Wooster /ˈwʊstər/ is a city in the U. S.  state of Ohio and the county seat of Wayne County.

cities.name: Rome
cities.description: Rome  is a city and special comune  in Italy.  Rome is the capital of Italy and of the Lazio region.
